title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: ChatGPT-Enhanced Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain math problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy using ChatGPT

Learners select two or more AI tools (e.g., GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT) using PEE (Performance Expectancy) and EEC (Effort Expectancy) metrics, execute a 4-week AI project with a weekly action plan, and submit a report meeting at least two of three evaluation criteria: final output (code/report), functionality, efficiency, and documentation checklist.
Learners successfully solve real-world job environment math problems (e.g., statistical calculations, equation solving) three or more times using ChatGPT

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
